title: I have a prolem
body:
Hi guys,
 
I want to play on the new client but when I press LAUNCH a window comes up and says tha I have to re-instal alpha client.
What can I do??

replies.body:
This error pops up if something went wrong during the Client upgrade process. You should be able to resolve this by going into your League installation folder (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends) and delete the **LeagueClient.exe** file, then launch league as admin (r-click, *run as administrator*) from the **lol.launcher.admin.exe** file. You can then attempt the upgrade process again.

Please let me know if this worked!
